profile:
At Restoration 1- Niagra we specialize in water damage restoration services. We also offer mould remediation, fire and smoke clean up and storm response services. We take care of cleaning up any water leak with our extraction service and state of the art drying systems. We can help you to remove all the water, dry your carpets, floors, walls and furniture to restore your home or office to its original condition or even better. We perform restoration services for both residential and commercial properties. No job is too big or too small for us. Since we work with the insurance company, but not for the insurance company, our commitment is to you, the property owner and your needs. Restoration1 Niagra will take complete care of you and guide you through the entire process of getting your property back to normal as quickly as possible. 

* Water Damage Restoration * Sewage Clean-up * Flood pump-out and extraction * Mould Remediation * Fire & Smoke Clean-up
service_area: St. Catherines, Niagara falls, Fort Erie, Welland, Haldimand, Pelham
